org.openx.market.ssrtb.crypter

Class SsRtbCrypter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openx.market.ssrtb.crypter.SsRtbCrypter

  • public class SsRtbCrypter
extends Object
    A class that can encrypt and decrypt the price macro used in Server-Side Real-time bidders.
